member.name: WINTRUST_FILE_INFO
member.summary: The WINTRUST_FILE_INFO structure is used when calling to verify an individual file.

member.name: WINTRUST_FILE_INFO.cbStruct
member.summary: Count of bytes in this structure.

member.name: WINTRUST_FILE_INFO.pcwszFilePath
member.summary: Full path and file name of the file to be verified. This parameter cannot be NULL.

member.name: WINTRUST_FILE_INFO.hFile
member.summary: Optional. File handle to the open file to be verified. This handle must be to a file that has at least read permission. This member can be set to NULL.

member.name: WINTRUST_FILE_INFO.pgKnownSubject
member.summary: Optional. Pointer to a structure that specifies the subject type. This member can be set to NULL.
